• ← File Menu
  • Import Raster Data →

Raster Data Analysis¶

Description of Modules¶

The Raster menu contains general functions related to raster (grid) data sets. Here, gridded data can be imported, filtered and displayed.

  • Import Raster Data
  • Import RGB Image
  • Equation Editor
  • Smoothing
  • Automatic Gain Control
  • Normalisation/Scaling
  • Gradients
  • Visibility Calculation
  • Continuation
  • Layer Stack and Resampling
  • Dataset Mosaic
  • Dataset Reprojection
  • Cut Raster Using Polygon
  • Clip Raster to Zoom Extents
  • Extract Profile from Raster
  • Raster Data Display

Context Menu¶

The raster context menus are available for rasters that have been imported and for modules which operate on raster data and have raster output data. The menu content depends on the status of the module. To access the context menu, simply right-click on a module.

  • Select Input Raster Bands
  • Display/Edit Metadata
  • Basic Statistics
  • Show Raster Data (Simple)
  • Show Raster Data (Advanced)
  • Show Anaglyph
  • Show Surface
  • Show Hexbin Plot
  • Show Histogram
  • Show 2D Correlation Coefficients
  • Export Data
 
  • ← File Menu
  • Import Raster Data →
